Module org.baxter.disco.ocr
Package org.baxter.disco.ocr

Class ConfigFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.baxter.disco.ocr.ConfigFacade
  • public class ConfigFacade
extends Object
    Facade for working with config files. Stores current config setup in RAM for easy access. Can write to file when requested, reads from file on initial start.
    Version:
    20 Jan. 2023
    Author:
    Blizzard Finnegan

    • Field Detail

      • activeCameras

        public static final List<String> activeCameras
        Read-Only List of available cameras. Is not set as final, due to current initialisation procedure.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigFacade

        public ConfigFacade()

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public static double getValue​(String cameraName,
                              ConfigProperties property)
        Get a given config value. All values are stored as doubles. Ints should be truncated. Any boolean that should be false should be stored as 0.
        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera (as defined in activeCameras)
        property - name of the property (ConfigProperties)
        Returns:
        double of config value. Returns -1 if invalid input.

      • getImgSaveLocation

        public static String getImgSaveLocation()
        Getter for the saved image location.
        Returns:
        Absolute path of the image save location.

      • setImgSaveLocation

        public static boolean setImgSaveLocation​(String path)
        Setter for the saved image location.
        Returns:
        false if path does not exist; otherwise true

      • setValue

        public static boolean setValue​(String cameraName,
                               ConfigProperties property,
                               double propertyValue)
        Set a given config value. DOES NOT SAVE VALUE TO FILE.
        Parameters:
        cameraName - Name of the camera (as defined in activeCameras)
        property - name of the property (ConfigProperties
        propertyValue - Value of the property
        Returns:
        true if set successfully, otherwise false

      • saveDefaultConfig

        public static boolean saveDefaultConfig​(String filename)
        Save current config to a user-defined file location.
        Parameters:
        filename - Name and location of the config file (typically, config.properties)
        Returns:
        true if saved successfully, otherwise false

      • saveDefaultConfig

        public static boolean saveDefaultConfig()
        Save current config to the default file location.
        Returns:
        true if saved successfully, otherwise false
